attributes.action: Make all the animals on the farm equal
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Animal Farm, where "all animals are equal, but some animals are more equal than others". That is no way to run a country!  We, the Equitable Life Pensioners, want to be in equality with Northern Rock, Bradford and Bingley and the Bankers.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
